name: I Hope You Find Love, Wherever The Wind May Take You
name_original: I Hope You Find Love, Wherever The Wind May Take You
description:
"I Hope You Find Love, Wherever The Wind May Take You" 

is a game about avoiding birds that are out to get you, embracing the ones that are there to help, and try to hang in there as long as possible.

Features:

  • See how long you can last with a time mechanic!
  • Made within Pico-8 Constraints.
  • Random spawning of birds. 
  • Commented source code

Controls:

Use the direction keys to move, and Z to start/restart the game.
